parameters.query:
-- Check if conversation already has a broker
SELECT 
  bc.*,
  b.name as broker_name,
  b.slug as broker_slug,
  b.photo_url,
  b.personality_type,
  b.voice_description,
  b.communication_style,
  b.approach_style,
  b.favorite_phrases,
  b.speaking_speed,
  b.voice_model
FROM broker_conversations bc
JOIN ai_brokers b ON bc.broker_id = b.id
WHERE bc.conversation_id = {{$json["conversationId"]}}
AND bc.status = 'active'
LIMIT 1;

-- Assign best broker using the function
SELECT 
  b.*,
  assign_best_broker(
    {{$json["leadScore"]}},
    '{{$json["loanType"]}}',
    '{{$json["propertyType"]}}',
    {{$json["monthlyIncome"]}},
    '{{$json["timeline"]}}'
  ) as assigned_broker_id
FROM ai_brokers b
WHERE b.id = assign_best_broker(
  {{$json["leadScore"]}},
  '{{$json["loanType"]}}',
  '{{$json["propertyType"]}}',
  {{$json["monthlyIncome"]}},
  '{{$json["timeline"]}}'
);

parameters.name: content

parameters.query:
-- Update conversation metrics
UPDATE broker_conversations
SET 
  messages_exchanged = {{$json["messageCount"]}},
  broker_messages = broker_messages + 1,
  last_message_at = NOW(),
  handoff_triggered = {{$json["shouldHandoff"]}},
  handoff_reason = '{{$json["handoffReason"]}}',
  handoff_at = CASE WHEN {{$json["shouldHandoff"]}} THEN NOW() ELSE NULL END,
  status = CASE WHEN {{$json["shouldHandoff"]}} THEN 'handoff_requested' ELSE 'active' END
WHERE conversation_id = {{$json["conversationId"]}};

-- Update broker metrics
UPDATE ai_brokers
SET 
  total_messages_sent = total_messages_sent + 1,
  last_active_at = NOW()
WHERE id = '{{$json["brokerId"]}}';

-- Track successful phrases if applicable
INSERT INTO broker_learning (
  broker_id,
  conversation_id,
  learning_type,
  successful_phrases,
  customer_segment,
  lead_score_range,
  created_at
) VALUES (
  '{{$json["brokerId"]}}',
  {{$json["conversationId"]}},
  'response_sent',
  ARRAY['{{$json["aiResponse"].substring(0, 100)}}'],
  '{{$node["Extract Customer Profile"].json["propertyType"]}}',
  '{{$node["Extract Customer Profile"].json["leadScore"]}}',
  NOW()
);
